content.detailedDescription:
After dark about 10:15 central. clear sky. no clouds and a very bright moon shining from the east. was in driveway with garage door open looking from garage door opening to end of driveway, having parked vehicle in driveway from street curb moments prior. gazing westward listening to loud music from a house party a few blocks away in the westward direction, it is common to witness path of commercial airliners in the distance on approach to o'hare moving south to north, from the westward sky, and to see another airline path of planes to my south moving west to east for landing at midway airport. in between both flight paths, i witnessed a series of orange lights or objects moving slowly in my direction from west to east looking like a string of helicopters in formation. 

the series of lights or objects did not have any pattern, but were each moving in parallel, very slowly, with one another in the same direction - eastward. there were no red or green blinking beacons on each light as i would see on any commercial or private aircraft in the night sky at any altitude. 

at first appearance, the steady stream of orange lights appeared to be approaching aircraft lights on a long and slow approach, to final at a runway, but they would continue on their slow path eastbound until one by one they would disappear in the upper atmosphere almost overhead of me at near 75 degrees upward, but slightly to my south. these lights could not be mistaken for meteors, because of their very slow speed. meteors would simply flash across the horizon. the formation of numerous lights in a string made me first think of helicopters flying in formation at  low speeds.

as i watched this string of lights move west to east and slowly dissipate in the upper sky one by one at about the same point in the sky, i ran into the house and retrieved my camera. the attached photo does capture the remaining lights in the direction i identified, but by then, the majority of the lights had disappeared leaving the remaining trail of lights as seen in the photo. 

after taking the photo and watching the string of lights slowly pass and disappear, a minute or more went buy then came another light in the same path, then about 30 seconds later, another lone orange light appeared in the westward sky on the same path and direction. then under one minute another came into view. same path, same speed, same point of disappearing into the upper atmosphere, or so it appeared, above and to the south of me.   

i will add that the lights were not pulsating, but remained viewable as consistent orange glows throughout. after i took the photo, i told my wife to come out and look. she too witnessed the remaining orange lights from the original string of lights. she went back indoors, that's when after about a minute or more looking westward, after the original string of lights disappeared overhead, that the independent lights came into view. that's when i walked over to my neighbor that was in her front yard walking her dog. i asked her to look at what i was viewing and she too acknowledged not being able to describe what the lights were. 

behind me, i had my garage lights on, the outside house lights and the moon was very bright to the east. all of which spread a great deal of light pollution preventing me from capturing the orange glows with more clarity.
content.summary: 10+ orange lights moving in parallel line  west to east then dissipating into upper atmosphere.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Long story so.. take a coffe before reading! and... sorry for my poor english, i'm a french canadian!

so, i'll begin with the situation. frist of all, i'm not a crazy fruit cake person. or... not so much more than most of peoples! ;) i like paranormal, but, i'm also a sceptic and believe in the same way. i'm in between so... all my stories, are for me...Always in my minds. trying to scientifically analyse it!

please: don't read this part in () if you're in a hurry or on a rush. or just not interested by my profile and my old strage stories.


(((((((((since i'm young, many stranges things occured around me. at 4 years old, i was the type of child how was talking abouts god in a way particulary strange for my mother... who was a beliver. for me, the nature was god. the countrys fighting for names of gods... haved wrong. she never understood me! in the same age... all what a can remember is, this fear, than occur the night, in my room. i remember some presences, looking me and touching me... but, i can't remember the faces and all! i've sleep under my blanket for many years... and each night... until 20 years old! i dream on the september 11, in the same time than the second plane was crashing in the tower. i was in this plane...In the dream. when i woke up, i was alone in my house, no t.V or radio on. but, when i open the t.V... surprise, it was occuring! i said many futur things, to many peoples in my life... and it was accurated! i saw, orange flying ball in my 10 years old. and one day, in 2006, this story. 
	
after my work's day, i had decided to back home by new path. then,i started to walk on a street, that goes to the north. strangely, may matter in the direction that i was walking, i always came back to the same point. in face of the same building. i walked 10 minutes to the south, north, east... probably for 30 minutes but, i was like in a return eternal point... i was walking in straight lines??? no curves!!! up to a point, i find myself out of this infernal maze. but in fact, when i looked my watches, it was more than 2 hours after my departure. a strange story... that i still can't understand now!))))))))

now, i'm 32 years old! since my 27 years old... i'v not really experience things! except:

	  	
since 1 year ago, i became obsessed with ufo, extra begins and all. nothing about the story on 2012.. before this... it was on my mind but..In a strange way. like, since i'm young, i've the feeling than i've no place on earth. please don't mistunderstood! it's not pooring my life! and i'm not thinking than i'm not human!!! loll just this feeling sometimes...Than they are something about me, than is not totaly understood by myself... 

but, in the same times, many flying strange object begins to past around my house! big light globes in the sky. red, blue, green. each week since 1 years ago. 

i started to suffer of the banshee syndrome. this feeling of being awake and, where you can't move. it's really scary! i have many dreams about flying vessels and abductions. in one of these dreams, they was examining me physically. i began to scream and crying with my mind: let me alone and do not hurt me! i wanted to ask them what they thought of humans! i couldn't see anything except a blinding light, and silhouettes. since then, i also have terrible physical pain. i was examined by doctors because my heart still beats too quickly. about 120 beats minutes resting. in the effort, i turn from 120 to 190 in 2 seconds! doctors do not find why! even after 2 weeks of hospitalization in cardiology! dreams are more occurrents and, the appearance in the skies also! when during 1 week, there was nothing, i'm better physically also!

this is it! a coincidence? i don't know? i continue to live normally! i'm not really afraid. i do not spend my day to think about this! but you can say, that i throw the head into the sky... much more often!
  	
please, if you do not believe these stories, don't let me bad messages. it is already very difficult to talk about it. because yes, i do not want you to say that i'm crazy and all. as many people, who keep silent, because they fear opinions of others! thank you!
content.summary: Many apparitions since 1 year, dreams, panic and more...

content.detailedDescription: Call and i tell u it allways happens, sometimes trianglular, disk,orbs super bright lights, shimmering almost looks like liquid disk in day.See em in my spotting scope ; see often .Last one very close plane was coming so it ascended(fast) plane? triangle w/three lights & one in center went by fast also silent slight hiss then it came down next i remember came home xcept it was way later (330am)my dog keeps looking up and flinching?? this has happend b fore i know who they r .Kh.47

content.summary: Last 1 path strait n rapid  ;lights dim over head then decend,[ plane?Coming]accent  pl. wnt.By then dec. overhead black disc silent two dim lights very close. i c all time have witneses on other ocasions. im facinated by them!!Much experiancesw/ifos call

content.detailedDescription: Looking up at the sky looking due east just above the horizon, saw a triangular shaped object. the triangular object appeared to be banked as it made a sweeping turn, at a high rate of speed. the object was climbing and eccelerating from east to south east away from where i stood and seemed to accelerate rapidly. the object progressivley accelerated from an already unnaturaly fast rate of speed to faster than the eye could track it. as it accelerated - it zipped out of sight, into the distance. the entire encounter lasted anywhere from 6 to 10 seconds. when i first saw the object it stook out to me as something that appeared foreign in nature, like no conventional aircraft that i know of. from what i can tell the object was so black, that it stood out against the low clouds and even gaps of night sky. there were no lights of any kind, nor after burner heat visuals. the way the object moved away from my position - had it been a conventional aircraft, i would have, or should have seen glow from the turbine engines. based on the speed and look of the object - i am forced to believe in something that i don't believe, which is the craft is a ufo.
content.summary: Looking up at sky just above horizon saw black triangular object.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 5.00pm, along whangara road,at an elevated scenic lookout over makorori beach, gisborne, new zealand, i took a digital photo of the beach and sea scene, in subdued light.
no unusual objects were seen in the vicinity before the photo was taken, but when viewed on my computer there was a distinct light object, consisting of an upper oval shape, with a light stream emission from from underneath. the object was viewed using an emboss filter in xnview and very distinct edges were detected.  a photo is enclosed and also a copy of the photo exif data.  i have taken many digital photos in the past which have also showed up unusual aerial objects.
content.summary: Appeared in digital photograph of seaview overlooking makorori beach, gisborne.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving about 8:30 pm on 241 toll road souhbound between irvine blvd and portola pkwy. going off ramp to pay toll looked out my drivers window at 60 degrees and noticed what i thought was helicopter very red and looked as if it was on fire bottom was flames red color on top. i then thought it was a hot air balloon.. but it was flying to fast. the bottom definitly had flames eminating from it. it moved in southeast to northwest direction for about one to two miles. i stopped my truck and starred right at it as it hovered over the road about 500-1000 feet above. it was not a helicopter or plane or balloon. i am 53 yrs old and have a masters degree and have never seen anything like this....Ever. i went to get my camera phone and video it but by the time i got it i looked up and just as i was to aim at it it vanished. no sght of it again. it disappeared. it as though was watching me and my actions and new i was going to photograph it and vanished. i then dialed 911 and reported it. of course what was i reporting ? a ufo not an emergency but no one seemed concerned or had any sense of urgency. i also contacted channel 4 nbc but again nothing. also i reported it to irvine pd. but nothing as well. i have never seen anything like this and i am positive it was not manmade. it was definitely a ufo and definitlety not an aircraft or meteor or asteroid or comet. feel free to call me. i saw it ..It was real and was a ufo...
content.summary: A ufo

content.detailedDescription: I was watching the moon on a clear night from my window may\18th\2012 at 2:48am and noticed a white glowing orb going over the top right of the moon.As i watched to see if it was a plane it slowed down over another bigger object on the left side of the moon, as i ran down my dark yard i leaned against my building to steady my camera and i saw the first orb speed up over the bigger one  that had the different colored lights on it and change shape, then there were 2 white orbs and the big object there  which made three,and it was huge. the sky was dark and thats how i first noticed them. i wasn't sure what it was but knew it wasn't a normal object cause it slowed down the went faster. the bigger ufo was fading in and out but my camera caught the lights on it and i steadyied myself by leaning against  the building to get a better video of it all, the saw the 2 brighter one's which really freaked me out even now cause this isn't the first time i saw something in the night skies, i bought a sony 70 times 2000x zoom handycam and decided to catch the moon colors that night and caught these instead,i lost site of the big ufo with the colored lights as i tried to follow the 2 white lights, the bigger ufo was lost and ended up with what i am sending mufon now. i have another video and pics  of a ufo that flew fast my house while recording a chopper in the daytime and   will be sending it to you later and very soon. thank you for believing in what we see and do catch on video.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 bright ufo's orbs and 1 really big shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: My wife informed me while her and my son were camping at braidwood ,il. outside by the campfire, they saw 2 white glowing, very bright objects. hover and then speed off very quickly. she has the pictures and a video on her phone. she can't send video because of it's length. this was a clear, no clouds, almost full moon lit night. she sent me the pictures to my phone. they are pretty amazing. i can't forward because i dont have internet on my phone, is there a cell number i can forward these to? she posted the video on facebook, i'm going to try to forward to you. this is not the first time these were seen by us out there. my daughter had a sighting last summer in this same area. i did not witness, but am contacting you because i'm home. and they are camping.
content.summary: Witnessed while camping on a clear almost full moon lit night

content.detailedDescription: I was driving at about 4-5 in the morning and i looked up and saaw a disc-like thing with lights
content.summary: I was driving and all of a sudden i looked up and there it was.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to look for cellphone in car and saw three huge objects in v formation in the sky.  ran back into get my wife and kids so i didn't sound crazy.  ran in after they saw to grab wifes cellphone to take picture objects then took off very fast towards moon.
content.summary: 3 bright orange objects, slow, then took off fast out towards moon

content.detailedDescription: While driving my car on hambley blvd. in pikeville (pike county), kentucky towards hwy 23. on june 2, 2012 at approximately 10:18 pm edt i was alerted by my son in the front passenger seat to the presence of strange lights in the sky on his, northern, side of the vehicle.  i pulled over and we both got out of the car to observe the lights.  there were six to eight lights that appeared to be drifting higher and towards the east.  they were yellowish and appeared to glow and at times twinkle red.  each light drifted up from the same point at the horizon.  they never changed direction nor speed.  after several minutes they faded out in the cloud cover.  another vehicle also pulled over and the driver got out to observe the lights as well.  after a few minutes, fewer lights emerged and after about ten minutes the entire incident was over.  no sound was heard.  there were no stars in the sky due to the cloudy/foggy conditions and the moon could also not be seen.  there were no other objects, including aircraft, observable during the incident.  i have never seen anything like this and have no idea what is was, other than the lights being quite odd.
content.summary: Multiple yellow, glowing lights seen drifting up from the horizon and heading higher and eastwards

content.detailedDescription:
ufo, flying north east towards kc, mo  


was siting on my balcony enjoying the nice weather outside when we(my sister and i) spotted this fast moving very bright, star like ufo.
content.summary: Bright ufo flying fast!

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Standing in my back yard i was looking up at the sky at 10:30 pm. an incredibly bright streak appeared exactly where i was looking. at the front of the streak was a craft the shape of a shoebox but slightly wider. the front sloped down at a 45 degree angle and had a windshield on it. the craft was a dull grey that looked like what an f-15 jet is made of. it was flying at 3,000 - 5,000 feet to the best of my knowledge and traveling 1,000+ miles per hour. my best guess is it was directly over the ground 5 miles away. it was probably 50 feet long, 35 feet wide and 20 feet high. the trail of light appeared to be caused by the craft traveling through the air, not by the propulsion unit. after about 3 seconds the craft dimmed and the trail (a mile long behind it) died out. the craft made absolutely no sound which was shocking considering how fast it was traveling and relatively close to me.
content.summary: Dull grey metallic, shoebox shaped ship leaving long bright trail

content.detailedDescription:
standing in front of house. saw airplane to the north leaving contrail.
turned around and looked to the south. saw small bright object moving
east to west in a straight line it did not lerve a contrail the object
then stoped and remained stationary.
 i called my son in law to come out and look at it. i showed him wher to look and he saw it also. the object was still in the same place but now
it was moving side to side and in circles.
 another object appeared moving south to north. much larger, moving in
a straight line. it appeared to be moving very fast. i looked back at the first object and it was still there. when i looked back to the second object it was gone. the first object then resumed moving wes and was
soon gone.
 my son in law went back into the house. about five minutes later i saw
another object to the south east. it moved behind some thin white clouds
,but i could still see it. the object then faded and was gone.
 neither i or my son in law had ever seen anything like it.
content.summary: Two witnesses saw small objects one moving strangely.

content.detailedDescription:
The event took place over the period of two days, february 22 and 23 of 2011.

february 22, 2011

while walking south on water st. (peterborough ontario) towards the downtown area, around 9:15pm, i looked left towards the river between elcombe and london st. and noticed two bright lights hovering above the street lights.

i stopped to observe these lights because i had never noticed them before and i have walked that route through out my whole life. the lights were both extremely brilliant white lights above the distinct orange glow of the street lights which seemed to be just feet below.

one light was a rather large orb shape, the other looked to formed of three small balls of light, forming a rectangular shape. i observed the lights for at least 5 to 10 minutes, when the orb illuminated intensely for a second, and then dimmed out and disappeared.

i continued to observe the other rectangular light, and stopped a passer by which i happen to know rather well (i went to high school with them).

i did not tell her what i saw, i asked her ���do you see that?��� her reply was ���that light above the street lights?��� confirmation of the sighting. we discussed it and parted ways, all along the light still sitting there until we were both out of sight of it.

i did not walk that way home that night, therefore i did not confirm if they were still there. the person who can confirm the sighting says on her way home she saw three lights, when before there was one (the second light dimmed out before they arrived).

february 23, 2011

i walked the same route the next evening, approximately 7:30pm (on my way to do groceries), i sat on the bench seen in the first picture (facing east), just to see what might happen. i hadn't been there for more than a minute when i saw a bright red, half sphere, with a clear silhouette above it.

the half sphere swung up (so the bottom of, whatever it was, was clearly visible) to the edge of the forward tree line across the river (in the 3 picture collage, where the snow ends to the middle left of the shot), then continued to swing back down just below the tree line, and level out.

it then immediately moved just below the tree line (in-between the forward tree line of the river and the second tree line where the suburbs begin) to the right, at a relatively fast speed, with no sound at all. my initial thought, when first observed, was thought to be a helicopter.

however, the object moved right, below the tree line and over the london st. footbridge, stops, and quickly changes direction the opposite way again.

the change in direction was almost immediate, maybe a second or two had passed. the object seemed to float and moved very gracefully. it came to a halt between and just above, the two street lights left of the footbridge, this is where i started recording. the event up until that moment was approximately 30 seconds to a minute in duration.

while recording the video, i clearly observed the object (the red half sphere and a silhouette, i am not sure how to describe it better). however, in the video, only three lights, a blue and two reds, appear to be moving in between the two street lights.

just before the video ends, i quickly pan to the left to capture another light (this time very bright light like the night before, and very small) quickly travel to the top of the tree line (in the 3 picture collage where the first two tallest evergreens are located to the middle left) and back down again.

this lasted a few seconds at best, and i was not able to capture it due to the quality of the phone camera. looking closer at the video, i noticed a third, red light, to the far left which is visible for a few seconds, and is in line with the other lights. also, when the contrast and brightness are increased, there is a multitude of lights pulsing on and off in an un-orderly fashion to the right and left, as well as a strange orange glow to the far right, near the end of the video.

i felt very strange after this event, and continued on to do groceries, all the while feeling a sense of numbness psychologically, in a daze, or in shock.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.shape: Cylinder,   Disc,   Flash,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Red half sphere dome on bottom, flying saucer

content.detailedDescription: My fiance was outside smoking cigarettes last night outside our home in plantation, florida about 4 minutes air time from the air port when he noticed these. by the time i got my cameraphone ready i had captured about half of the lights before they disappeared into, well, into the air. the entire time these lights were int he sky - not one plane took off or landed. this was around 9:30 pm
content.summary: Bright lights following like ducks

content.detailedDescription:
Hello

i am sending this video to you for review. this happen on 5/25/2012 at 6:30 pm in the palmdale, ca area. i am using a sony trv-530 camcorder with a  ir 720 filter. i was facing toward the west filming the clouds. i caught this on my camcorder and saw it after it was  downloaded to my computer. there are triangular  lights  at the end of the video. it will be between time of 1:35 seconds and 1:41 sec . there will be a street light to the right of the screen . then to  the left side middle of the screen  2 lights on top  and  1 faint  on the bottom appear for a short time.

thank you
content.summary: Caught on download to computer

content.detailedDescription: I was having a party in my back yard, someone pointed out a small yellow star-like dot moving at a steady pace slanting upwards. we all gathered and saw close to 30 of these star-like orbs coming up from behind the houses in front of us but it had to be at least 10-15 miles away from us, we did manage to catch pictures and a video of this event. it lasted around 10 minutes and we all saw the same thing.
content.summary: Around 30 lights seen by party

content.detailedDescription: We had 4 sightings on 6-1-12 all evening and through the night. me and two others were in the backyard star gazing. when i said there's another one! two of us saw the first flash, all three of us saw the second flash. it was a dull object that flashed twice. they came from the east and then after second flash shot north.
content.summary: 3 of us sitting in the backyard. i was faceing east, they come up fast, stop, and a bright flash. cruzed alittle ways stopped and flashed again. like the flash of a camera.

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting on deck ~7:30 6/1, leaned back and looked up, noticed white star-like object (like seeing venus during the day). was very light out yet. kept watching, it was lower than high clouds which were moving to the sw as the clouds passing over did not obscure it. it slowly moved, almost imperceptable, to the ssw over the course of an hour and i lost sight behind treeline. walked out behind trees about 20 minutes later and it was still there in extreamly slow path to ssw. checked in another 20 minutes and did not see anything anymore. about 15 min later, again on the deck, i glanced up and it was directly overhead again litterally stationary, the whole time i saw it you could barely see it move (at arms length with your thumb and small finger extended it moved that distance in a half hour). while we watched it, a cloud passed over it, about 10 seconds after the cloud passed it got about 50% brighter for about a half second then disappeared. both my daughter and i saw the same blink / disapearance because we both said '....Did you see that..." at the same time. was outside until about 9:00pm and didn't notice anything else. our backyard has a lot of trees so we're limited to a view of 90deg plus or minus 25 degrees.

last note, as i opened up the picture i took, i just noticed what could be a second object below the first, did not notice it when i took the picture.
content.summary: Starlike object overhead moving extreamly slow

content.summary: Starlike object overhead moving extreamly slow

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting on deck ~7:30 6/1, leaned back and looked up, noticed white star-like object (like seeing venus during the day). was very light out yet. kept watching, it was lower than high clouds which were moving to the sw as the clouds passing over did not obscure it. it slowly moved, almost imperceptable, to the ssw over the course of an hour and i lost sight behind treeline. walked out behind trees about 20 minutes later and it was still there in extreamly slow path to ssw. checked in another 20 minutes and did not see anything anymore. about 15 min later, again on the deck, i glanced up and it was directly overhead again litterally stationary, the whole time i saw it you could barely see it move (at arms length with your thumb and small finger extended it moved that distance in a half hour). while we watched it, a cloud passed over it, about 10 seconds after the cloud passed it got about 50% brighter for about a half second then disappeared. both my daughter and i saw the same blink / disapearance because we both said '....Did you see that..." at the same time. was outside until about 9:00pm and didn't notice anything else. our backyard has a lot of trees so we're limited to a view of 90deg plus or minus 25 degrees.

last note, as i opened up the picture i took, i just noticed what could be a second object below the first, did not notice it when i took the picture.
content.summary: Star-like object overhead, drifting south extreamly slow, lost sight, reapeared overhead

content.detailedDescription:
First let me say this event happened over 35 years ago (somewhere in the early 70's). my wife and i were returning to new york from penn. via 95. it was approx. 8pm and dark. as we approached wilmington on 495 we saw a lot of different lights in the sky in front of our car at approx. 300'-500' high. now remember, we are traveling at 60mph on a multi-lane highway in the middle lane. hard to stop. i remember there was a river to the right of the highway. as we approached the lights i could see the object was enormous. it filled the windshield with no visible end in any direction. no end to the mutitude of lights. as i drove it moved ever slow slowly to my right across the sky. it seemed to stand still. there was no sound we could hear over the car noise. the best discription i can give to the object comes from the movie "forth of july". they had it right. it was a vertual city upside down. my wife and i accepted what we saw and kept on truckin. 
when one considers the great exspance of space, who would travel in a little saucer? 
we are telling our story now just for the record.
content.summary: This event happened or 35 years ago. craft was to big to see the ends or shape!
